name: City Clicker (Graham Sanders, Maisic, poetahto, India Wishart)
name_original: City Clicker (Graham Sanders, Maisic, poetahto, India Wishart)
description:
You are an omnipotent god expanding a tiny city into a sprawling metropolis. You are capable of creating Credits from thin air with just a single click (don't ask us how this affects your city's economy). As you create more capital, you are able to build more infrastructure which helps your city grow!

  • Over 100+ unique news event tickers!
  • 11 Unique buildings & structures!
  • Tax Collection!
  • Guns, Lies & Romance! (sold separately)

When your society has finally outgrown its cradle, venture into the final frontier and discover what may lay wait for you among the stars!

  • WASD to move camera & set new building location (center of screen)
  • Click to generate credits!

pst! the build here is broken. check the AGL discord #winter-game-jam-22 channel for a working Mac & Windows build! https://discord.gg/hdD9wXfh

Programming by Daniel ‘Poe’ Walls

Art by India 'sixlegdragon' Wishart

Sound Design by Maile ‘Maisic’ Pacumio

Music by Graham Sanders

News Writing by Karmen Kay & Graham Sanders

Voice Acting by Karmen Kay
